description: This file defines a service class 'ServiceProvisioningService' that provides methods to interact with a backend API for managing services such as fetching, creating, updating, deleting, deploying, and other related operations.

classes.name: ServiceProvisioningService
classes.description: A class encapsulating API calls for service management operations

methods.name: getServices
methods.description: Fetch a paginated list of services with optional search

methods.name: getService
methods.description: Retrieve details of a specific service by ID

methods.name: createService
methods.description: Create a new service with provided data

methods.name: updateService
methods.description: Update an existing service by ID

methods.name: deployService
methods.description: Deploy a service to target devices

methods.name: undeployService
methods.description: Undeploy a service from target devices

methods.name: getServiceStatus
methods.description: Get current status of a service

methods.name: getServiceMetrics
methods.description: Retrieve metrics data for a service

methods.name: getServiceLogs
methods.description: Fetch logs related to a service

methods.name: validateServiceConfiguration
methods.description: Validate the configuration of a service before deployment

methods.name: previewServiceDeployment
methods.description: Preview deployment commands and estimated duration

methods.name: getDeploymentHistory
methods.description: Retrieve deployment history of a service

methods.name: rollbackService
methods.description: Rollback a service to a previous deployment

methods.name: exportService
methods.description: Export service configuration as a blob

methods.name: importService
methods.description: Import service configuration from a file
